column2: It's dark and spooky over here. Trees are whispering some weird things.
The path looks old and forgotten.
You are on the City's main street. Crowd is moving all around.
You enter a cosy corner shop. A fireplace is burning and the shopkeeper is waddling around.
You walk down a nasty narrow street. Everything here is wet and ugly.
You enter the town hall. The interior looks stunning. Everyone is staring at you. You feel that you shouldn't be here.
Sewers are a really wet place. It is quiet and empty here. Only rats are looking at you.
